__comment_on_comments__: Fields starting with '__comment*' are comments only and can be deleted without changing the functionality.

output-location.__comment-1: The directory where output files are written in subdirectories.
output-location.__comment-3: ./rps/ for the file containing the parameters

backgrounds.__comment-1: You can turn the background images off and on
backgrounds.__comment-2: All files are selected from a directory with a given filename extension.

rendering-methods.__comment-1: You can enable different rendering methods
rendering-methods.__comment-2: render is the default rendering method it creates a realistic image
rendering-methods.__comment-4: render-color-correspondnece-image renders the correspondence to the reference mesh as 3d positions as color coded value
rendering-methods.__comment-5: render-normals renders visualization of the vertex normals relative to the camera
rendering-methods.__comment-6: render-albedo renders the albedo of the face instance
rendering-methods.__comment-7: render-illumination renders a visualization of the illumination

morphable-model-parameters.__comment-1: This block configures how face identities are generated and if they have expressions.
morphable-model-parameters.__comment-2: You need to download the Basel Face Model and cite the paper in your publication.
morphable-model-parameters.__comment-1: A value of 0 for any dimension will return always the mean for this dimension

illumination-parameters.__comment-1: Choose illumination distribution from Basel Illumination Prior 2017 from 'empirical', 'multiVariateNormal' or 'staticFrontal'.
illumination-parameters.__comment-2: Download the data into the directory and cite paper in your publication!
illumination-parameters.__comment-3: no-color removes replaces all illumination components by the mean over all color channels (non-colored illumination)
illumination-parameters.__comment-4: if fix-energy is set the value of the energy of Spherical Harmonics illumination is set to the value defined by energy-value

pose-variation.__comment-1: Distribution for the 3d- and 2d-pose of the face.
pose-variation.__comment-2: Each distribution is either a 'gaussian', a 'constant', a 'uniform' or a 'mixture' with weighted components.
pose-variation.__comment-3: A distribution for each 3d rotation angle yaw, roll and pitch in degrees.
pose-variation.__comment-4: A distribution for each 2d shift along the x- and y-axis in image pixels.
pose-variation.__comment-5: The scaling is the distribution of the focal length.
pose-variation.__comment-6: Choose the centering of the face in the image from 'none', 'facebox','landmark'.

image-dimensions.comment: The image size of the generated images in pixels.

default-parameters.__comment-1: Default parameters for the rendering process.
default-parameters.__comment-2: Please change these values only if you know what the code of the image-generator does.

__comment-landmark-tags-1: The tags specifying which landmarks will be stored in the tlms file.
__comment-landmark-tags-2: Each landmark tags needs to be stored in the model .h5 file.
__comment-format-version: The version flag is for reproducability in case the software and file-format changes.
